title: White House Reveals Its Mission Authorization Plan for Novel Space Activities
summary: Less than an hour before a House committee marks up legislation expanding the Department of Commerce’s regulatory authority for space activities, the White House is revealing its own plan for […]

title: White House proposal would split mission authorization between Commerce and Transportation
summary: The White House has unveiled its long-awaited proposal for regulating novel commercial space activities, splitting those responsibilities between the Commerce and Transportation Departments.

title: Deterring a looming Space Pearl Harbor through better public discourse
summary: Will the U.S. act promptly and responsibly to address its space vulnerability, or must it wait for a catastrophic event like a 'Space Pearl Harbor' to spur action? The potential for such an attack raises concerns about the Pentagon's assurances regarding timely capabilities for deterring and defending against this impending threat.

title: Daily Telescope: Is that a seahorse or something more sinister in the sky?
summary: "I showed it this way because I have seen way too many sci-fi movies."

title: SaxaVord Spaceport to host HyImpulse orbital rocket launches
summary: The UK’s SaxaVord Spaceport plans host orbital launches of HyImpulse Technologies rockets from late 2025.
